content: Aminul Islam is currently working as a software engineer at Ridmik Labs, Dhaka, Bangladesh. He has completed my B.Sc in Computer Science and Engineering from Bangladesh University of Engineering and Technology.
summary: I am currently working as a software engineer at Ridmik Labs, Dhaka, Bangladesh. I have completed my B.Sc in Computer Science and Engineering from Bangladesh University of Engineering and Technology.
title: Md. Aminul Islam
